title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Project for Developing Cultural Value Internalization and Realization Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language learning experience and cultural literacy comprehension
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners Explain Five Core Principles (e.g., Cultural Context Reflection, Multidimensional Metric System, Integration of Qualitative/Quantitative Assessment Methods) to Consider When Designing Cultural Value Internalization and Realization Evaluation Tools and Present a Design Framework by Applying Them to a Practical Case (e.g., AI-Based Cultural Adaptation Evaluation System)
Develop measurement methods for seven cultural value elements (achievement, confidence, creativity, respect, discipline, nationalism, tolerance)
Perform validity verification procedures for assessment tools using exploratory factor analysis (EFA)
Propose improvement plans for assessment tools incorporating expert reviews and learner feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
